Package ru.jango.j0loader

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataLoader.LoadingListener<T>
    Listener interface for loading (uploading and downloading) process.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataLoader<T>
    Base abstract loader class.
    JSONLoader
    Special loader for handling JSON responses.
    LoadingAdapter<T>  
    ParamedLoader<T>
    Parametrized loader.
    Request
    Class-container for information, needed for loaders to work:
    URI of the request destination List<Param> with request parameters (for HTTP POST and GET) HTTP method - basically it is determined automatically, GET is in priority size of the response data in bytes (value of HTTP response 'content-length' header, file size, etc.; -1 if the data size is unknown or unavailable)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Request.Method
